ddd
  • Home
  • Reference

ddd.date

ddd.date

date(timeResolution, fromPeriod, toPeriod, format, saveDate = NULL)

Arguments

timeResolution
choice between "daily","hourly","minute","second"
fromPeriod
"YYYYmmddHHMMSS"
toPeriod
"YYYYmmddHHMMSS"
format
conversion into a vector "YYMMDDHH" or a matrix "YY,MM,DD,HH"
saveDate
"YYYYmmddHHMMSS"

Examples

res <- date(timeResolution="hourly",
            fromPeriod="20150215",
            toPeriod="20150218",
            format="YY,MM,DD,HH")
head(res)
